entry.title: Technical Knit Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sale
Price: 25.00

Technical Knit racerback sports bra made from our seamless fabric in a vibrant azure colour. Designed for a strong look in our signature second skin fabric. To ensure maximum comfort and support the bra boasts ventilation mesh panels under the bust and at the back. Wear it for low-mid intensity workouts. Made from 94% Polyamide 6% Elastane.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small.

entry.title: Odyssey V2 Mesh Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sale
Price: 70.00

The Odyssey V2 Mesh Tank is a standout layering style. This fully breathable performance tank features colourful technical tape that highlights the shoulder with a bold stripe print. Move with ease, with the sleek bonded seams and side slits for increased mobility.

Mesh: 68% Polyamide, 32% Elastane. Contrast: 73% Polyamide, 27% Elastane

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small.

entry.title: Performance Cross Back Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 35.00

This lightweight, fitted tank is a must-have for any wardrobe. The fine, moisture-wicking fabric, internal support at the chest and mesh insert at the small of the back ensure comfort when working out, while the slim fit, dipped hem, delicate straps and loop over cross back make it eminently wearable for any occasion. Made from 72% Polyamide 28% Elastane.

Model is 5'10 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Racer Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 30.00

The Sierra geometric print is carefully placed on the racer bra to flatter the bust while the bronze technical taping shapes the racer-back design. Merging performance and style, this piece is made in Italian fabric with mesh ventilation panels to enhance breathability for your workout. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh

SHOP THE LOOK

Our design team have pushed the boundaries on design and performance by using a new print process to achieve this luxury metallic finish. entry.title: Hyper Crop
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type:
Price: 25.00

The Hyper Crop is available in dual colours, Garnet and White. Inspired by circuitry, the Hyper print design is knitted into the fabric and placed strategically to highlight the female form. Built with second skin circular knit fabric, this crop is a seamless choice for low impact, floor-based exercises. Made from 74% Polyamide, 21% Polyester, 5% Elastane.

Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type:
Price: 30.00

The Odyssey Crop is a signature Lucas Hugh style for the season. Opalescent technical taping offers textural structure to highlight and contour the body while a full mesh back allows for breathability. Focusing on design, breathability and functionality this crop is made for mid-low impact activities. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

Focusing on design, breathability and functionality this bra is made for mid-low impact activities. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

entry.title: Technical Knit Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 50.00

Slightly darker than marine, this super soft navy Technical Knit Sports Bra (without removable bra cups) with a scoop front neckline and racer back finish. Features ventilation mesh panels at the under bust and back chest, with added support of compression knit lining to give you support where you need it. Suitable for low to medium impact activities. Made from 94% Polyamide 6% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Strobe Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sale
Price: 25.00

The classic Technical Knit Adjustable Sports Bra, crafted in our seamless circular knit fabric, is updated with the seasonal Strobe design. This bra features adjustable straps to give you the perfect fit with removable cups for optional coverage and a plain ribbed waistband for comfort and support. Inspired by the dynamic lines of strobe lights, this tonal print is placed to contour alongside the reflective triangles for visibility. Made from 70% Polyamide 25% Polyester 5% Elastane.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small

entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sale

Slim fitting Technical Knit crop in red and nude made with our seamless circular knit fabric. Inspired by Kinesiology sports taping using a mix of mesh and rib textures the pattern is knitted into the fabric to flatter your figure. This crop is made with an internal bra which features ribbed knit for support in 74% Polyamide 21% Polyester 5% Elastane.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small. Please size up - this style runs small.

entry.title: Performance 7/8 Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sale
Price: 55.00 - 65.00 (4 variants)

This season get your classic Performance 7/8 legging, designed for a cropped fit, in our dynamic new Pinstripe print. Wear these compression leggings for high-intensity workouts in and outside of the gym. The style is designed with a mid-rise elasticated waistband, reflective triangles for visibility, pinhole mesh ventilation panels and a seamless zip pocket for key storage.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size extra-small. If you are in between sizes, we recommend sizing up. Made from 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane.

entry.title: Dynamo Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sale
Price: 30.00

A new sports bra silhouette this season in the SS19 seasonal Pinstripe print. The Dynamo sports bra is a low-mid impact bra with great ventilation due to its unique design. The open back shape with halter neck straps features a lower back mesh panel for added breathability and comfort. While the supportive elasticated hem band and v-neck shape give a flattering secure fit. This bra is made from 80% Polyamide, 20% Elastane

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small.
